page.title: 14A 435 : TRUNK ROAD
page.content: The{A435 }is a busy trunk road carrying a large amount of freight from the {West Country} to the { {Midlands.}The road is very narrow at the{Race Course} and in{Bishop's {Cleeve }there is a dangerous right angled bend called{Gilders Corner,} which is an accident black spot. Also each day at 4.30pm the road becomes congested by local commuters from Smiths Industry at{Smiths Traffic {Lights.}A pedestrian crossing has recently been installed.A Bypass was suggested in 1926.By 1974 there were 3 alternative routes;in 1984 a popularity survey decided on Option D which would pass to the west of{ {Bishop's Cleeve. }This plan would mean that a thousand new homes might be built on farming land between the bypass and the village.
